thread.title: Deontay Wilder lands thunderous knockout blow to stop Gerald Washington - CBSSports.com
thread.title_full: Deontay Wilder lands thunderous knockout blow to stop Gerald Washington - CBSSports.com

author: Brandon Wise
title: Deontay Wilder lands thunderous knockout blow to stop Gerald Washington - CBSSports.com
text:
Deontay Wilder lands thunderous knockout blow to stop Gerald Washington The Bronze Bomber retained his title in emphatic fashion on Saturday in Alabama 7m ago â€¢ 1 min read 
Deontay Wilder may not have looked himself for the first four rounds, but all it takes is one punch from the heavyweight champ. Wilder (38-0, 37 KOs) was tentative and immobile to start the fight, staying stagnant and allowing Gerald Washington to keep the pressure on with his jab and counterpunches. 
But in a flash, Wilder ends the fight with a flurry. Washington dropped like a sack of potatoes into the ring ropes and continued to fight for a short time before the ref finally called off the action. 
Winner
